name: FROM RUSSIA WITH TROLLS
description:
In the war for public opinion they have realized the importance of alternative and meaningful information to protect their rights from media lies and propaganda . The ability to influence a country and the public at large lies in their own hands it has been proved. Unfortunately, the media has been very successful in its attempt to control the public debate. It influences how we think. In my opinion, this is the greatest threat against freedom and independence. The behavior of the media to create an artificial issue of cyber crime is getting out of hand .It has been well-documented that technology is used for propaganda and to shape public opinion, it is the major threat that we face in the digital era.
